Text: Outlook: Sector tailwinds intact  We expect pan-India player ACC to be a prime beneficiary of the positive industry fundamentals . We continue to value the stock at 12x CY20e EV/Ebitda and maintain 'BUY/SP'.
Cause: Outlook: Sector tailwinds intact  We expect pan-India player ACC to be a prime beneficiary of the positive industry fundamentals .
Effect: We continue to value the stock at 12x CY20e EV/Ebitda and maintain 'BUY/SP'.
